description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.Item.0yJjfyvWg5pDLcVR]{Conditions}

>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.4MxAK5uS0zMNWhUK]{Dying} + @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.nEJIWMKbPjqKuelo]{Dead} + @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.lf8pbezocjYIvR9y]{Unconscious}

If you were @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.4MxAK5uS0zMNWhUK]{Dying} but spent Resolve Points to stabilize (see Using Resolve Points beginning on page 250 in Injury and Death), or if you received healing from an ally, you are @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.H51jmhxF9XuwDOE7]{Stable}.

You are no longer @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.4MxAK5uS0zMNWhUK]{Dying}, but you are still unconscious.
